mapper.select: SELECT a.nick, a.comment_date, a.comment, a.comment_private, b.party_title FROM party_comment as a JOIN party as b ON a.party_num = b.party_num AND b.id = #{id} AND a.id != #{id} ORDER BY comment_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party_member(id, nick, party_num, mycharge, mystartday, use_account, use_point) VALUES (#{id}, #{nick}, #{party_num}, #{mycharge}, NOW(), #{use_account}, #{use_point})
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(party_end, '%y.%m.%d') AS party_end FROM party WHERE party_num = #{party_num}

SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), party_end) as diff, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), party_end) * party_charge AS pay, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), party_end) * party_charge * 0.1 AS plus FROM party WHERE party_num = #{party_num};

SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF (DAY, a.mystartday, b.party_end) AS diff, TIMESTAMPDIFF (DAY, a.mystartday, b.party_end) * b.party_charge AS pay, round(TIMESTAMPDIFF (DAY, a.mystartday, b.party_end) * b.party_charge * 0.1) AS plus FROM party_member AS a JOIN party AS b ON a.id=#{id} AND b.party_num=#{party_num};

SELECT a.party_num, a.party_member, b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE party_num=#{party_num}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num;
mapper.update: UPDATE party SET party_available='0' WHERE party_num=#{party_num}
UPDATE member SET point = point - ${use_point} WHERE id = #{id}
